languages.text: "Отдельно я благодарен вам за огневую поддержку, когда мой отряд продвигался по низу палубы. Меткость, своевременность — своими выстрелами по топливным трубам вы дали нам существенное преимущество".
"On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."
languages.original_text: "Отдельно я благодарен вам за огневую поддержку, когда мой отряд продвигался по низу палубы. Меткость, своевременность — своими выстрелами по топливным трубам вы дали нам существенное преимущество".

traits.locale_text: "On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."
"On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."
"On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."
"On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."
"On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."

languages.text: 「ところで、私の部隊が下層デッキを進攻する際の火力支援に感謝しています。あなたの射撃技術、そしてタイミング。燃料パイプへの射撃が私たちの戦況を大きく傾けました」
languages.original_text: "On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."

traits.locale_text: 「ところで、私の部隊が下層デッキを進攻する際の火力支援に感謝しています。あなたの射撃技術、そしてタイミング。燃料パイプへの射撃が私たちの戦況を大きく傾けました」

languages.text: "Ich bin übrigens dankbar für Eure Feuerunterstützung, als mein Trupp zum unteren Deck vorstieß. Eure Treffsicherheit, Euer Timing – Eure Schüsse auf die Treibstoffrohre haben uns einen relevanten Vorteil verschafft."
languages.original_text: "On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin übrigens dankbar für Eure Feuerunterstützung, als mein Trupp zum unteren Deck vorstieß. Eure Treffsicherheit, Euer Timing – Eure Schüsse auf die Treibstoffrohre haben uns einen relevanten Vorteil verschafft."

languages.text: "Ayrıca mangam alt güverteye ilerlerken verdiğiniz ateş desteği için müteşekkirim. Nişancılığınız, zamanlamanız ve yakıt hatlarına yaptığınız atışlar; bize kayda değer bir üstünlük sağladı."
languages.original_text: "On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca mangam alt güverteye ilerlerken verdiğiniz ateş desteği için müteşekkirim. Nişancılığınız, zamanlamanız ve yakıt hatlarına yaptığınız atışlar; bize kayda değer bir üstünlük sağladı."

languages.text: «Por otra parte, agradezco el apoyo de fuego que prestó a mi unidad mientras avanzábamos por las cubiertas inferiores. Su precisión y elección del momento de disparar a las tuberías de combustible nos dieron una gran ventaja».
languages.original_text: "On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."

traits.locale_text: «Por otra parte, agradezco el apoyo de fuego que prestó a mi unidad mientras avanzábamos por las cubiertas inferiores. Su precisión y elección del momento de disparar a las tuberías de combustible nos dieron una gran ventaja».

languages.text: “另外，当我的小队在底层甲板前进时，我很感谢你提供的火力支援。无论是你的枪法，还是开火的时机，都无可挑剔。你打爆了燃油管道，为我们创造了巨大的战术优势。”
languages.original_text: "On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."

traits.locale_text: “另外，当我的小队在底层甲板前进时，我很感谢你提供的火力支援。无论是你的枪法，还是开火的时机，都无可挑剔。你打爆了燃油管道，为我们创造了巨大的战术优势。”

languages.text: « Je souhaitais également vous remercier pour la couverture que vous avez fournie à mon escouade lors de son avancée sur le pont inférieur. Votre précision et votre sens du timing, ainsi que la destruction des canalisations de carburant, nous ont donné un véritable avantage. »
languages.original_text: "On a separate note, I am grateful for your fire support as my squad advanced on the lower deck. Your marksmanship, timing — your shots on the fuel pipes gave us a significant advantage."

traits.locale_text: « Je souhaitais également vous remercier pour la couverture que vous avez fournie à mon escouade lors de son avancée sur le pont inférieur. Votre précision et votre sens du timing, ainsi que la destruction des canalisations de carburant, nous ont donné un véritable avantage. »
